00028 void IAnalyze::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00029 
00030     string key = "options.ianalyze";
00031 
00032     _resolution_logJ2 = opt->get(key+".resolution_logJ2").as< double >();
00033     _states = opt->get(key+".states").as< vector<int> >();
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 bool IAnalyze::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00038 
00039     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00040 
00041     if (!nblist.size()) {
00042         cout << endl << "... ... No pairs in topology. Skip...";
00043         return 0;
00044     }
00045 
00046     for (int i = 0; i < _states.size(); ++i) {
00047         this->IHist(top, _states[i]);
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void IAnalyze::IHist(Topology *top, int state) {
00053 
00054     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00055     QMNBList::iterator nit;
00056 
00057     double MIN = log10(nblist.front()->getJeff2(state));
00058     double MAX = log10(nblist.front()->getJeff2(state));
00059 
00060     // Collect J2s from pairs
00061     vector< double > J2s;
00062     J2s.reserve(nblist.size());
00063 
00064     for (nit = nblist.begin(); nit != nblist.end(); ++nit) {
00065         double J2 = log10((*nit)->getJeff2(state));
00066 
00067         MIN = (J2 < MIN) ? J2 : MIN;
00068         MAX = (J2 > MAX) ? J2 : MAX;
00069 
00070         J2s.push_back(J2);
00071     }
00072 
00073     // Prepare bins
00074     int BIN = ( (MAX-MIN)/_resolution_logJ2 + 0.5 ) + 1;
00075     vector< vector<double> > histJ2;
00076     histJ2.resize(BIN);
00077 
00078     // Execute binning
00079     vector< double > ::iterator jit;
00080     for (jit = J2s.begin(); jit < J2s.end(); ++jit) {
00081 
00082         int bin = int( (*jit-MIN)/_resolution_logJ2 + 0.5 );
00083         histJ2[bin].push_back(*jit);
00084     }
00085 
00086     vector< int > histN;
00087     histN.resize(BIN);
00088     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00089         histN[bin] = histJ2[bin].size();
00090     }
00091     FILE *out;
00092     string tag = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00093                + "_INTEGRALS_" + ( (state == -1) ? "e" : "h" ) + ".dat";
00094     out = fopen(tag.c_str(), "w");
00095 
00096     fprintf(out, "# IANALYZE: PAIR-INTEGRAL J2 HISTOGRAM\n");
00097     fprintf(out, "# STATE %1d\n", state);
00098 
00099     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00100         double J2 = MIN + bin*_resolution_logJ2;
00101         fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4d \n", J2, histN[bin]);
00102     }
00103     fclose(out);
00104 }
